Scripts.OnEvent: -- call the OnEvent method on our Addon (runs every time an event fires) igf_events:OnEvent(this, event, arg1, arg2, arg3, arg4, arg5, arg6, arg7, arg8, arg9)
Scripts.OnLoad: SendSystemChat("igf Event Monitor loaded.") -- call the OnLoad code of our Addon (runs when the game does a load/reload) igf_events:OnLoad(this)
